4f3d2f0c87e37a7a8e5e7aa4c69f8e90a5d3c1b7: query GetUser($id: ID!) { user(id: $id) { id name email } }
7a8e9f0c1b2d3e4f5a6b7c8d9e0f1a2b3c4d5e6f: query GetPost($id: ID!) { post(id: $id) { id title content author { id name } } }
1e2f3a4b5c6d7e8f9a0b1c2d3e4f5a6b7c8d9e0f: mutation CreatePost($input: CreatePostInput!) { createPost(input: $input) { id title } }
9c0d1e2f3a4b5c6d7e8f9a0b1c2d3e4f5a6b7c8d: query ListPosts($first: Int!, $after: String) { posts(first: $first, after: $after) { edges { node { id title } } pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } } }
